synonyms.synonym: V-jun avian sarcoma virus 17 oncogene homolog

protein.general_function: Involved in sequence-specific DNA binding transcription factor activity
protein.specific_function: Transcription factor that recognizes and binds to the enhancer heptamer motif 5'-TGA[CG]TCA-3'

go_class.description: sequence-specific dna binding transcription factor activity
